text: Auranga River flows through the Latehar and Palamu districts in the Indian state of Jharkhand.The Auranga originates (starts) near Soheda.It flows into the Koel near Kechki south of Daltonganj.Its main tributaries are the Sukri and Ghaghri. ==References== Category:Rivers of Jharkhand
title: Auranga River (Jharkhand)
